content: Sporting event delegation This is a list of **flag bearers who have represented Singapore at the Olympics.** Flag bearers carry the national flag of their country at the [opening ceremony](/wiki/Olympic_Games_ceremony#Opening) of the [Olympic Games](/wiki/Olympic_Games). #Event yearSeasonFlag bearerSport1(/wiki/1948_Summer_Olympics)SummerJocelyn de Chee](/wiki/Lionel_Chee)[Water polo](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1956_Summer_Olympics)4(/wiki/1960_Summer_Olympics)Summer5(/wiki/1968_Summer_Olympics)Summer6(/wiki/1972_Summer_Olympics)Summer[Pat title: List of flag bearers for Singapore at the Olympics
